job_purpose: Designing software applications, developing new capabilities, and handling all software-related functions at Aerodynamic, a leading flight data services provider for major airlines and maintenance repair facilities globally.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Software development, software upgrades, verification & validation
Developing new capabilities of software applications, interfacing with hardware to meet requirements
Researching, consulting, analyzing, and evaluating system program needs
Testing, debugging, diagnosing, and correcting errors and faults
Writing and maintaining program code to meet system requirements
Writing, updating, and maintaining technical program, end-user documentation, and operational procedures
Providing advice, guidance, and expertise in developing proposals and strategies on projects
required_qualifications: Degree qualified Software Engineer with 2 years of local or international experience in software development, embedded engineering, or equivalent
Knowledge of programming software languages (C, C++), packages, and platforms including Python, React, JavaScript
Electronics hardware and software engineering qualifications highly regarded
company_details: Aerodynamic is an avionics equipment service provider with over 30 years of experience, specializing in solutions for commercial and business jet operators, MRO’s, and military customers. They are dedicated to delivering quality support, services, and knowledge to ensure minimal business downtime.
